name: ARDELYX
sampleDescriptions: Payment for drugs for patients with end stage renal disease
Issues related to the 2025 End-Stage Renal Disease (ESRD) Prospective Payment System (PPS) Final Rule (CMS-105-F), specifically the inclusion of oral-only drugs in the ESRD PPS Bundled Payment.
